1.content: Stuffing (as seen above) - To stuff as much food/creatures as possible. Normaly incluedes a big belly that expands with stuffing. If digestion is inclueded, after so many hours the belly will be not as big, and weight gain may be involved
1.name: Stuffing

2.content: Weight Gain Enjoyment - An after digestion/weight gain action of playing/appritiating the new size and weight of the predator, either him/herself or someone else.
2.name: Weight Gain Enjoyment

3.content: Weight Gain - Prey is digested and turned into extra fat on the predator. Depending on the artist/writers liking will be where and how much weight is gained.
3.name: Weight Gain (Vore)

4.content: Digestion: A Term to digest/consume to the body what ever is in the stomach - expelling of gas (belching, farting) may be included.
4.name: Digestion (Vore)

5.content:
Short for "voraphilia" or "vorarephilia": a fetish in which one fantasizes about being eaten alive or eating another creature alive (sometimes known as phagophilia). The most common type of vore is "soft vore", being swallowed or swallowing whole with no bloodshed. There is also the less common "hard vore" which involves the tearing and chewing of flesh. Other types of vore include macrophilia and microphilia, in which one character involved in the vore is larger or smaller than normal.

Many might associate vore with cannibalism; however, most voraphiles do not favor cannibalism. Vore is an imaginary fetish; that is, it is impossible to perform in real life in the way most fantasize, unlike most cannibalism.
5.name: Vote Definition

6.content: Absorption Vore: A type of devouring where the person's body is merged with the predator, oftentimes forming an amorphous whole that reshapes into the form of the dominant/predating personality - Or, the prey is ingested and certain body features transfer to the predator. (e.g some of the prey's breast size is transferred into the predator's breast size, causing growth.)
6.name: Absorption

7.content: Breast expansion is a fictional sexual fetish of watching a woman's breast expand/ grow
7.name: Breast Expansion
